AUXILIARY_DESCRIPTIONS.Hector Galvencio Paz-Ortega and Carlos E: Two Guatemalan citizens transported illegally by Juventino Mejia-Orosco, considered smuggled aliens
AUXILIARY_DESCRIPTIONS.Juventino Mejia-Orosco, Hector Galvencio: Group involved in human smuggling operation, including the transporter and two smuggled aliens
AUXILIARY_DESCRIPTIONS.Juventino Mejia-Orosco's van: vehicle used for transporting smuggled aliens from Guatemala, seized pending forfeiture proceedings and containing $4,102 USD and 574,000 Mexican pesos
